note.p: Tailor. Son of Louis Martinelli, coach maker. Married Emily Elizabeth Andrews in 1854. Member of the Queckett Microscopical Club, 1867.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/96/31/17), 1881 (RG11/179/57/36), 1901 (RG13/492/170/41)
Journal of the Queckett Microscopical Club 6 (1879–81): 27
London, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1906 (Ancestry.com, accessed 27 February 2017)
